hero.heading: One Platform. Endless Use Cases.
hero.descrip: Whether you’re managing team expenses, sending payouts, or building loyalty programs, our infrastructure supports a wide range of business needs. Choose from ready-to-use card formats - physical, virtual, single-use, crypto, gift, and fuel and tailor them to your workflows.

careerPositions.title: Physical Cards
careerPositions.descrip: Plastic cards with your brand, delivered to your team or customers. Perfect for on-the-go spending like travel, fuel, or fieldwork.

careerPositions.title: Virtual Cards
careerPositions.descrip: Instantly issued and ready to use for online purchases, subscriptions, and remote team expenses.

careerPositions.title: Digital Wallets
careerPositions.descrip: Easily add cards to Apple Pay, Google Pay, and other mobile wallets for seamless tap-and-go payments.

careerPositions.title: Crypto Cards
careerPositions.descrip: Link to crypto wallets and convert on-the-fly for real-world spend. Useful for platforms operating in digital asset environments.

careerPositions.title: Restricted Loop Cards
careerPositions.descrip: Branded cards for promotions, rewards, or loyalty programs.

careerPositions.title: Single-Use Cards
careerPositions.descrip: Auto-expiring cards designed for one-time transactions. Great for trial subscriptions, one-time vendor payments, or other limited-use cases.

footer.heading: Have a use case in mind? Let’s build it together.
footer.subheading: We’ll help you set up the right flow, card type, and controls for your business.
